metadata.title: CVE-2014-7848 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: lib/phpunit/bootstrap.php in Moodle 2.6.x before 2.6.6 and 2.7.x before2.7.3 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a directrequest, which reveals the full path in an error message.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
